snippet.title: Readers Remember Bill Meehan
snippet.description:
Readers Remember Bill Meehan
By David Morrow 06:44 PM EDT 09/18/01
Reminiscing about a regular guy who had a great rapport with his audience and once wore a Hawaiian shirt on CNBC.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10001232/1/readers-remember-bill-meehan.html
